title: RISC-V zkVM Track
description: Verify the arithmetization of RISC-V zkVMs. Ensure polynomial constraints exactly encode RISC-V instruction semantics based on the official Sail RISC-V specification.

title: EVM Track
description: Show that an EVM running on RISC-V correctly implements the EVM specification. Focus on performant implementations compilable to RISC-V zkVMs.

title: Cryptography Track
description: Verify the specification, proofs of security, and implementation of proof systems and cryptographic primitives used by zkVMs.
